articles.title: Study finds AI better at spotting ovarian cancer than doctors
articles.author: Talker News
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence is better than doctors at spotting ovarian cancer, according to new research. Researchers based in Sweden developed and validated neural network models able to differentiate between benign and malignant ovarian lesions. They trained and tested the AI on more than 17,000 ultrasound images from 3,652 patients across 20 hospitals in eight countries. They compared the models' diagnostic capacity with a large group of experts and less experienced ultrasound examiners. The AI models outperformed both expert and non-expert examiners at identifying ovarian cancer.

articles.title: Study finds AI better at spotting ovarian cancer than doctors

articles.title: Study finds AI better at spotting ovarian cancer than doctors
articles.author: Talker
articles.summary: Artificial intelligence is better than doctors at spotting ovarian cancer, according to new research. Scientists based in Sweden developed and validated neural network models able to differentiate between benign and malignant ovarian lesions. The team trained and tested the AI on more than 17,000 ultrasound images from 3,652 patients across 20 hospitals in eight countries. They compared the models' diagnostic capacity with a large group of experts and less experienced ultrasound examiners. The AI models outperformed both expert and non-expert examiners at identifying ovarian cancer.
